td.content: s:white f aged 68 ys complains of moderate vomiting x 3 days. NKDA. o:Height 60 in, Weight 121 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt presents with moderate vomiting for more than 3 days. she is a white F engine mechanic aged 68 ys. o:Height 59 in, Weight 118 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Distal subtotal gastrectomy - stomach.

s:patient presents with moderate nausea, mild vague postprandial epigastric pain. pt also reports of moderate vomiting. pt is a female aged 69 years. she denies ever using cigarettes denies any alcohol use o:Height 60 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

content2.Unmatched: she denies ever using cigarettes denies any alcohol use

td.content: s:a F aged 69 ys presents w/ c/o 5 weeks h/o mild vague postprandial epigastric pain, moderate nausea and moderate vomiting. o:Height 60 in, Weight 121 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV.
